lidar_conversions 2.1.0
Point type conversion from sensor driver to LidarPoint used in SLAM process.
The ROS Velodyne driver can be found at https://github.com/ros-drivers/velodyne. The ROS Ouster driver can be found at https://github.com/ouster-lidar/ouster_example. The ROS RSLidar driver can be found at https://github.com/RoboSense-LiDAR/ros_rslidar.
Note that point types are copied in external_include folder and need to be updated if drivers change
